name: Jar Doo Chicken Wings
author: Tina Spencer
summary: This is my favorite item on a Chinese Buffet.  If you love chicken wings, you'll absolutely love these!!!
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds chicken wings, tips removed and wings cut in half at joint
directions: Whisk together the soy sauce, ginger, gin, water, sugar, and salt in a small bowl
Arrange wings in a single layer in baking dish
Pour the soy sauce mixture over the wings
Pour oil into a 2-quart saucepan; heat oil to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Drain and discard marinade from wings
Cook wings in batches in heated oil until brown and no longer pink on inside, 10 to 15 minutes
Drain cooked wings on paper towels before serving
